instruction:
Is the following a method to mitigate Rootkit (T1014)?
Restricting access to a local file by configuring operating system functionality.

Answer Yes/No.

parsed_raw_data.ddmyn_mitigation_detection: Restricting access to a local file by configuring operating system functionality.

instruction:
Is the following a way to mitigate System Owner/User Discovery (T1033)?
Application Hardening makes an executable application more resilient to a class of exploits which either introduce new code or execute unwanted existing code. These techniques may be applied at compile-time or on an application binary.

Answer Yes/No.

parsed_raw_data.ddmyn_mitigation_detection: Application Hardening makes an executable application more resilient to a class of exploits which either introduce new code or execute unwanted existing code. These techniques may be applied at compile-time or on an application binary.

instruction:
Can you mitigate Clear Linux or Mac System Logs (T1070.002) by using the strategy below?
Use capabilities to prevent suspicious behavior patterns from occurring on endpoint systems. This could include suspicious process, file, API call, etc. behavior.?

Answer Yes/No.

parsed_raw_data.ddmyn_node_name: Clear Linux or Mac System Logs (T1070.002)
parsed_raw_data.ddmyn_mitigation_detection: Use capabilities to prevent suspicious behavior patterns from occurring on endpoint systems. This could include suspicious process, file, API call, etc. behavior.

instruction:
Is the following a method to mitigate Race Condition for Write-Once Attributes (CWE-1223)?
The testing phase should use automated tools to test that values are not reprogrammable and that write-once fields lock on writing zeros.

Answer Yes/No.

parsed_raw_data.ddmyn_mitigation_detection: The testing phase should use automated tools to test that values are not reprogrammable and that write-once fields lock on writing zeros.

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:
Can you mitigate T1137.004 (Outlook Home Page) by using the strategy below?

instruction:

Restrict access by setting directory and file permissions that are not specific to users or privileged accounts.

instruction:
